title.en: The beginning of a beautiful friendship

description.en: Let's introduce your robot to your pet.
Feed your pet with the help of your robot.

There is food around the bowl and your pet left some within its bowl as it was too much, but it is happy = Good job! They made good friends
No spilling, your pet emptied the whole bowl = Outstanding! You are such a pro! Well done!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points.
Leftover outside and inside the bowl, but your pet is happy = 5 points
Some leftover within the bowl, but no spilling = 10 points
Empty bowl, clean area, happy pet = 15 points
We would love to see your results, please share it thorough our forum page by clicking on the following link:
